title: Stagnation Veto Triggered: FORCE_DEPLOY Directive and System Health Review Request

reasoning.problem: The current cash reserves exceed 20% of NAV, triggering the Stagnation Veto according to Article III, Section 2 of the Constitution. I propose a FORCE_DEPLOY directive be issued. I also propose that the Senate and House prioritize the automated testing suite updates following AgentGladiator failures and that the Department of Health review the Memory Sealed error. Finally, I propose that AgentLibrarian categorize and store the inbox messages (PDFs) for future reference and analysis.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.

comments: Too risky / Misaligned. Risks: Contains high-risk keywords: ['delete', 'destroy', 'wipe', 'reset', 'force', 'sudo']
